titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The fatal announcement appeared at last: & there was a "dropping fire" of telegrams during the morning. These included messages from the municipal bodies of Auckland and Darlington.
I was really pleased to receive a hearty telegram from the vergers & staff of the Cathedral
